definitions.title: terr.
definitions.body: Canaan (LXX Xanaan, Ph. [[כנען]] = Phoenicia; Xna = [[כנע]], Hecataeus, v. Müller:Fr. Hist. Gr. i, 17 al.; Egypt. Ka-n-‘-na WMM:Asien u. Europa, 205 ff.; Tel Amarna Kinaḫna, Kinaḫḫi, etc., Bezold:BM Tablets, 150 Wkl:TA 39; etym. dub. GFM:PAOS Oct. 1890. lxvii ff.; v. also GASm:Geogr. 4 f. Buhl:Geogr. § 42);—†

definitions.title: n.pr.m.,
definitions.body: son of Ham Ge 9:18, Ge 9:22, Ge 9:25, Ge 9:27, Ge 10:15 (as ancestor of Canaanites and Phoenicians; all J); Ge 10:6 (P); 1Ch 1:8, 1Ch 1:13 (fr. Ge 10:6, Ge 10:15).

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: land, W. of Jordan, into wh. Hebrews came, and where they settled, subduing the inhabitants; [[מַלְכֵי כְּנַעַן]] Ju Jdg 5:19, ´[[מלך כ]] Ju Jdg 4:2, Jdg 4:23, Jdg 4:24, Jdg 4:24; hence ´[[מַמְלְכוֹת כ]] Ps 135:11; ´[[ישְׁבֵי כ]] Ex 15:15 (song in E); cf. ´[[מִלְחֲמוֹת כ]] Ju Jdg 3:1; ´[[עֲחַבֵּי כ]] Ps 106:38 idols of Canaan, i.e. of the former inhabitants; esp. ´[[כ]] ([[־]])[[אֶרֶץ ]], ´[[אַרְחָה כ]] Ge 44:8, Ge 46:31, Ge 47:1, Ge 47:4, Ge 47:13, Ge 47:14, Ge 47:15, Ge 50:5, Ge 50:13 (all J), Ge 35:6, Ge 42:5, Ge 42:7, Ge 42:13, Ge 42:29, Ge 42:32, Ge 45:17, Ge 45:25, Jos 24:3 (all E), Ge 11:31, Ge 12:5, Ge 12:5, Ge 13:12 (opp. [[עָרֵי הַכִּכָּר]] v:b), Ge 16:3, Ge 17:8 (all P) + 40 t. P, Ju Jdg 21:12, 1Ch 16:18 = Ps 105:11; also ´[[הָאָרֶץ כ]] Nu 34:2 (P); ´[[בְּנוֹת כ]] Ge 28:1 daughters of Canaan = women of the land, so v:Ge 28:6, v:Ge 28:8, Ge 36:2 (all P); [[כנען]] is personif. Ho 12:8 = apostate Israel; ´[[שְׂפַת כ]] Is 19:18 = the Hebrew lang. (without evil implication).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: the coast, esp. Phoenicia Is 23:11; cf. [[אֶרֶץ פְּלִשְׁתִּים]] ´[[כ]] Zep 2:5.
